statements: SELECT * FROM compost_decomposition WHERE material_name = 'leaves';
SELECT material_name, decomposition_rate FROM compost_decomposition WHERE decomposition_rate > 0.5;
SELECT material_name, start_date, end_date FROM compost_decomposition ORDER BY material_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM compost_decomposition WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(material_id) AS total_records FROM compost_decomposition;
SELECT * FROM compost_decomposition WHERE material_id = 1 ORDER BY decomposition_rate DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, end_date FROM compost_decomposition WHERE decomposition_rate > 5.00;
SELECT material_name, start_date, end_date FROM compost_decomposition WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01' AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT AVG(decomposition_rate) AS avg_rate, material_name FROM compost_decomposition GROUP BY material_name HAVING avg_rate > 3.00;
SELECT material_id, material_name, decomposition_rate, start_date, end_date FROM compost_decomposition WHERE material_name LIKE 'Organic%' ORDER BY material_name ASC, decomposition_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM decomposition_rates;
SELECT material_name, decomposition_rate FROM decomposition_rates WHERE material_name = 'Paper';
SELECT * FROM decomposition_rates ORDER BY decomposition_rate DESC;
SELECT material_name, AVG(decomposition_rate) AS avg_rate FROM decomposition_rates GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT * FROM decomposition_rates WHERE decomposition_rate > 0.5 AND decomposition_rate < 0.8;
SELECT * FROM decomposition_rates WHERE decomposition_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, AVG(decomposition_rate) AS average_rate FROM decomposition_rates GROUP BY material_name HAVING AVG(decomposition_rate) > 0.3;
SELECT process_id, material_name, start_date, end_date FROM decomposition_rates JOIN composting_process ON decomposition_rates.id = composting_process.material_id;
SELECT material_name, COUNT(*) AS total_processes FROM decomposition_rates JOIN composting_process ON decomposition_rates.id = composting_process.material_id GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT material_name, decomposition_rate, CASE WHEN decomposition_rate > 0.7 THEN 'High' ELSE 'Low' END AS rate_type FROM decomposition_rates ORDER BY rate_type DESC, decomposition_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM organic_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT id, material_name FROM organic_materials WHERE decomposition_rate > 0.5;
SELECT bin_id, temperature, moisture_level FROM compost_bins WHERE temperature < 50 AND moisture_level > 0.6;
SELECT material_id, bin_id, decomposition_timestamp FROM decomposition_logs ORDER BY decomposition_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM organic_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%fruit%';
SELECT * FROM organic_materials WHERE decomposition_rate > 0.5;
SELECT material_name, decomposition_rate FROM organic_materials ORDER BY decomposition_rate DESC;
SELECT bin_id, temperature, moisture_level FROM compost_bins WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM decomposition_logs INNER JOIN organic_materials ON decomposition_logs.material_id = organic_materials.id WHERE organic_materials.material_name = 'Leaves';

SELECT decomposition_timestamp, material_name FROM decomposition_logs INNER JOIN organic_materials ON decomposition_logs.material_id = organic_materials.id INNER JOIN compost_bins ON decomposition_logs.bin_id = compost_bins.id WHERE compost_bins.temperature > 25 ORDER BY decomposition_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM organic_materials;
SELECT material_name, decomposition_rate FROM organic_materials ORDER BY decomposition_rate DESC;
SELECT bin_id, location FROM compost_bins WHERE temperature > 50;
SELECT material_name, decomposition_percentage, timestamp FROM organic_materials JOIN decomposition_data ON organic_materials.material_id = decomposition_data.material_id;
SELECT * FROM decomposition_logs WHERE temperature < 30;
SELECT * FROM organic_materials WHERE decomposition_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY material_id ASC
SELECT material_name, decomposition_rate FROM organic_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'G%'
SELECT location, temperature FROM compost_bins WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT material_name, decomposition_percentage, timestamp FROM organic_materials JOIN decomposition_data ON organic_materials.material_id = decomposition_data.material_id

SELECT material_name, temperature, oxygen_level FROM organic_materials JOIN decomposition_data ON organic_materials.material_id = decomposition_data.material_id JOIN decomposition_logs ON decomposition_data.data_id = decomposition_logs.data_id WHERE temperature < 25 ORDER BY material_name
SELECT * FROM Materials;
SELECT material_name, decomposition_rate FROM Materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name FROM Materials WHERE decomposition_rate > 3.00;
SELECT * FROM CompostBins WHERE bin_capacity <= 10.00 ORDER BY bin_location ASC;
SELECT bin_location, material_name FROM CompostBins JOIN Materials ON CompostBins.material_id = Materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM Materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT bin_location, bin_capacity FROM CompostBins WHERE bin_capacity > 100 ORDER BY bin_capacity ASC;
SELECT log_date, temperature FROM TemperatureLogs WHERE temperature > 30.00 AND log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(level) AS average_moisture FROM MoistureLevels WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM TemperatureLogs WHERE temperature < 25.00);

SELECT bin_location, ph FROM CompostBins JOIN TemperatureLogs ON CompostBins.bin_id = TemperatureLogs.bin_id JOIN PHLevels ON TemperatureLogs.log_id = PHLevels.log_id WHERE ph < 7.0 ORDER BY bin_location ASC;
